Implementation Gallery Team Credits Press

Give credit where credit is due.

All credit for the algorithm development to “Image-to-Image Translation Using Conditional Adversarial Networks” by
Phillip Isola, Jun-Yan Zhu, Tinghui Zhou, Alexei A. Efros published in arxiv, 2016. The associated software, pix2pix, can be found here.

The dataset of satellite imagery and map tiles was downloaded from Mapbox.

Orignal data © OpenStreetMap contributors.
